definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Whales and dolphins rely on their responsive hearing to interpret returning echolocation clicks.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼和海豚靠回声定位系统来辨别方向。

sentences.english: Really wired to see a Dolphin pull-off that joke!
sentences.chinese: 看到海豚开这样的玩笑真的很兴奋。
这些小海豚长得一模一样。

sentences.english: It was soft and slippery. It felt a little like velvet.
sentences.chinese: 海豚的鳍摸起来又软又滑，感觉有点像天鹅绒。

sentences.english: The poor pauper paused on purpose to pawn a porpoise.
sentences.chinese: 贫穷的乞丐有意停下来典当一只海豚。

sentences.english: An estimated 23,000 dolphins and porpoises are killed in Japan each year.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，日本每年有2万3千只海豚和小鲸被屠杀。

sentences.english: What could be better than swimming with dolphins?
sentences.chinese: 还有什么比和海豚一起游泳更棒的事吗？

sentences.english: Beef up your Dolphin by installing your favorite Add-ons.
sentences.chinese: 通过安装你喜爱的插件来加强你的海豚浏览器。

sentences.english: Lithuania's main aquarium is celebrating the birth of two baby dolphins.
sentences.chinese: 立陶宛的主水族馆正在庆祝二只小海豚的生日。

sentences.english: When I'd go out with the dinghy, manta ray would escort me, dolphins.
sentences.chinese: 当我划着小舢板出海时，蝠鲼和海豚会为我护航。

sentences.english: When the noise bounces off a fish or a rock, the dolphin hears the echo come back again.
sentences.chinese: 当声音从鱼或岩石反弹回来时，海豚再次听到回声。

sentences.english: She adds that dolphin therapy is only a small part of her overall program.
sentences.chinese: 她补充道，海豚疗法只是她整个项目的小小一部分。

sentences.english: Adult dolphins are from 2 to 4 metres long and weigh from 150 to 650 kg.
sentences.chinese: 成年海豚体长2至4米，体重150至350公斤。

sentences.english: I’m using a technique I learned from a 6)dolphin trainer.
sentences.chinese: 我用上了从海豚驯兽师那里学到的方法。

sentences.english: Hector's dolphins are found only in New Zealand where the population has fallen to 7, 000.
sentences.chinese: 赫氏海豚只在新西兰周围的海域发现。

sentences.english: I think __ Porpoise is very interesting in the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得在动物园里海豚是很有趣的。

definition: white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]
turtle/Internet slang for 海歸|海归[hai3 gui1]
